chara.textHome: Why, hello there.

This is your Coordinator and ally to all,
Mitama Yakumo.

I may not look it, but I'm still very young
and always ready to party.

I can be found strengthening magic
with various items and selling
wares of my own design.
Why not have a look?♪
The logic behind touching another's magic?
Hmm, it's like a magnet perhaps?

If their magic energy is "N",
then my own is "S".
I can touch it just fine!♪

Does this mean it's okay to tinker with
everyone more than I already do?
*Giggle*

I feel awakened somehow,
and motivated to work even harder.

Since I can't fight, becoming stronger
just helps me feel a little better
 and nothing more, though

I do wish to become strong enough to fend
for myself when Momoko and the others
aren't around to protect their Coordinator.

Without the power to fight, selling items like
this is a survival technique for me.

I'm absolutely not exploiting the others
to get Grief Seeds, nope...
Ah, I just thought of a new business venture♪
Welcome!

You must have some nerve
to keep the Coordinator waiting.

I'll have you keep me company
for the whole day!

I'd like start my morning right and
cook my own breakfast, but...

*Sigh*
I wonder if Yachiyo, Iroha, or Momoko
would make something for me...
I'm in student mode during the day!

Even with bad attendance,
my grades are always at the top.
I can't blame anyone for being jealous.

I get very busy this time of the day,
dealing with all kinds of Magical Girls.

Now, now,
don't touch anything on that shelf.
*Yaaawn*
Oh, I'm already getting sleepy...
I'm done being Coordinator for today.

That's the benefit of having
irregular business hours!

I don't mind being busy in the evenings,
but I get so lonely when
my customers are gone.

Could you keep me company
for a little while?

Another day of exterminating Witches
for Grief Seeds.
Good luck, everyone!

If you take Felicia with you,
it'll be done in no time.

That's right, I'll need everyone to solve the
mystery of the Endless Mirrors.

And I'll be here with all my items, ready
and waiting for them to come back safely.
I try to show up at school from time to time.

I have to juggle my job as a Coordinator too,
so my attendance is barely enough
to move on to the next grade.

So, what kind of adjustments
do you need me to make?

If you don't tell me in 10 seconds,
I'm going to choose what I mess with!
Too bad, so sad!

Aren't you naughty,
touching my products without permission.

Oh, I know!
It's not much of a punishment, but
why don't you cook with me?
I love sitting next to the heater.
Once I'm there, I don't ever budge.

Unless I need to go to the bathroom or
take a bath, I'm always in snuggle mode.

Thanks to my neutral position as
Coordinator, this area is a 
safe no-fighting zone.

*Chuckle*
It's a great place to escape to, isn't it?

I do feel bad for always relying on Momoko
to fight Familiars and Witches for me.

But she's too nice,
I can't help depending on her.
Kanagi just pops out of nowhere all the time.

Still, she's the only one I can talk with
 about my past, so I can't get mad at her.

What am I going to do with all
these Grief Seeds I'm collecting?

Well, all I can say is that I need them
to purify my Soul Gem in my line of work.
Take that, and that, and that!

I hit pesky rascals like you in
places that weaken their magic!

*Chuckle*
I'm only joking, of course!

I don't really want to get my hands dirty,
but...
My my, not too shabby, if I do say so myself!
I'm so nervous, my heart is pounding...

Your Coordinator would appreciate
a compliment or two!
Thank you, everyone, you're all a big help.

Oh my, I can't allow this.
It's my job to be the
Coordinator for everyone.
Monopolizing me is a no-no!
*Giggle*

Well anyway, it's a pleasure to
make your acquaintance.

Hmm, "enhancement"...
I could get used to this, don't you agree?

No one else can be allowed to see this side
of the Coordinator, is that clear?

Some things must remain a mystery
no matter how much you wish to know.
But I'll make an exception this time♪

You can find your Coordinator in
Shinsei Ward, inconspicuously hidden
within a building down a back alley.

Word of mouth alone has made
my business boom...

*Giggle*
Nevermind, nothing♪

The concentration of Witches and
Magical Girls in Kamihama is high.

Due to that, magic energy condenses into
various crystals.

Bring the crystals to me and I'll make them
into something useful for you.
